name: Dual Shielding
description:
Overview

You and your fellow technomancer must defend the grand mancer against an onslaught of magical attacks. Can you work together to escape or will you fail before the grand manser can finish casting your escape?

Description

This is a reflex co-op game made using the Construct 2 game engine in a team of two. 

Controls

W,A,S,D:   Player 1

Arrowkeys:     Player2

P = pause
